name: Savior in Wolf's Clothing (Short Test Game)
name_original: Savior in Wolf's Clothing (Short Test Game)
description:
I really wanted to practice ren.py again one night, so this is a *very* short project I did to just make sure I remember all the commands and how things work. I figured it'd be fun to release it anyways, since it technically is a full experience.

I hope y'all enjoy it! And shoot, if enough people like it, I won't say no to making it not just a short experience >;3
